channel.title: Dev Home on Stuart McColl
channel.description: Recent content in Dev Home on Stuart McColl

item.title: My Microsoft Build 2023 takeaways
item.description: I’m slowly working my way through my backlog of Microsoft Build 2023 session recordings, but wanted to take some time out to summarise my key takeaways from this year’s event. The common thread that ran throughout the event this year was artifical intelligence (AI), woven into sessions focused on what developers are building and how they’re building it, as well as sessions looking at the future of work and how this will be impacted by AI.
